name: PACE KEEPER
description:
a game dev that's just released their stepmania clone to the world is trying to promote it through any means necessary. grow in the ranks of popularity and become the emperor of... arrows?

CONTROLS
mouse -- menus
left, down, up, right arrows // aswd // zx,.  --  receptors

an incremental game made in a couple of days for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023.
procrastination and feature creep got the best of me, so the final product is without polish, sound, and is (most likely) unbalanced. although i do plan to continue working on it in my spare time in the future. but for now, just use your power of imagination to imagine that some sick sounds are played in the background (or just open up spotify or something :D).

download the font featured in the game: smol v2
